title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Project Properties Info page uses text fields instead of labels.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should use labels instead of text fields. Using labels will improve the appearance of the page on all motif platforms.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Project Properties dialog. 2. Navigate to the Info page.
